pmlib_sysconfig_pmmc.h File Reference
System Configuration

This file declares the interface for the system configuration for switching on or switching off modules or putting them in HW controlled Auto Clock Gated mode via the PMMC. More...

#include <ti/drv/pm/include/pm_types.h>
#include <ti/drv/pm/include/pmmc/pmhal_pmmc.h>

Data Structures

 Structure to define the system configuration Table for a module. More...
 
struct  pmlibSysConfigPmmcErrReturn
 Structure to help the user understand if the module configuration was successful or not. If it is a failure the reason for the failure is also returned. More...
 
struct  pmlibSysConfigPmmcDetailedState
 Structure to help the user get the more detailed power mode in the PMLIBSysConfigPmmcGetPowerState API. More...

Detailed Description

This file declares the interface for the system configuration for switching on or switching off modules or putting them in HW controlled Auto Clock Gated mode via the PMMC.
